title: Encrypted Maze
author: jimmythelynx
description:
Encrypted Maze 1.0

Use the shape, position and spinning direction of two marked coordinates to decrypt your starting position, the goal and the maze you're in. Move around and be irritated by the changing markers.

Module ID: encryptedMaze
Created by: jimmythelynx
